data.name: Spark The Battle Dog
data.detailed_description:
Spark The Battle Dog, is a Top down Shooter in which you control "Spark", a military dog specialized in weapons. In the near future, almost all human beings on earth were exposed to a virus that turned them into zombies. Thomas, a boy lost in the forest, appears to be the key to a possible cure for infection. Spark's arduous mission is to protect and escort Thomas to the refuge of the last surviving humans, but a gang of mutant animals, led by King Brutus, a Bull Dog willing to destroy the human race, will do anything to stop him!



GAMEPLAY

Camp defense:
Most enemies will ignore Spark and will focus on attacking the hut where Thomas is hiding. Improve camp defenses and make Spark's job easier.

Hitting the road:
Spark needs to go out on a motorcycle to collect supplies periodically, but the roads are full of infected people. Shoot, in the best "terminator" style and make your way.

Survival:
In this type of stage, Spark is the target! Upgrade your weapons and destroy giant hordes of zombies.



FEATURES

*72 stages
*5 boss battles
*Weapon upgrade
*Camping upgrade

data.short_description: The boy Thomas contains the cure for zombie infection in his DNA, so he shouldn't be hurt. It's up to you to protect it from hordes of hectic zombies and other mutant animals. Upgrade your weapons, your camp and most importantly ...Survive! Are you prepared?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7 or superior
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
